QuestData.Title: Razor Beak and Antlers Pointy
QuestData.Description: What happened to me, you ask? Listen, $c, and listen well, for my tale is one of tragedy...$b$bI was sent here to Owl Wing Thicket to find some relics. I only made it this far before I was overwhelmed by a flurry of wings and talons.$b$bHow they roared and pecked, $c!$b$bI now lay here, a broken orc, with nothing but vengeance on my mind. Please, $c, if you have any sense of honor, you will go into Owl Wing Thicket and help me regain mine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 Owlbeasts in Owl Wing Thicket.
QuestData.CompletionText: They came at me two at a time, $c. I stood no chance.
QuestData.RewardText: My honor is restored.$b$bPartially.$b$bMy tale continues, $c, for I have left portions of my honor elsewhere in this forest.$b$bIt has not been a very easy journey for me.
